title: Decorating the City
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Uwaaaah~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Chikacchi? Chikacchi~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, sorry, Mari-chan! I spaced out!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, there are so many pictures of us, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>And they said it’s not just in the shopping district! Let’s go visit the other places~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes~! Let’s visit all of them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, before that! I need to thank the store owners that put our pictures up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re right. Maybe I’ll give them some sweets from Hotel Ohara.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh! I want that too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It can’t be helped. I’ll get you some too, Chikacchi♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
